snippet: Harvard plans to change the title of from “house master” to a term that will better reflect “the 21st-century needs of residential student life.”
abstract: Harvard College announces plans to change title of heads of residential housing from traditional term 'house master' to undecided term that better reflects 21st-century student life; change follows recent campus unrest over racial bias, whether factual or symbolic.
lead_paragraph: Harvard plans to change the title of from “house master” to a term that will better reflect “the 21st-century needs of residential student life.”

headline.main: Harvard to Discontinue Use of ‘House Master’ Title
headline.print_headline: At Harvard, ‘House Master’ Is Discontinued as Job Title
